Via twitter

  • via Silex Labs

  • via Michael Baczynski

    • Via google+

    Flambe 1.2 has been released and is now on haxelib

    • New blog post : Fourth Week Mobile Game Progress Update

    New Event [18th September] : Introduction to Haxe and NME

    • Via libraries

    HXMPP 0.4.11 has been released

  • via Tong

    • MassiveInject is a port of the AS3 SwiftSuspenders dependency injection library

  • via Massive Interactive

    • MassiveMVC is a post of the AS3 RobotLegs framework

  • via Massive Interactive

    • MassivePartial is a macro utility for managing multiple platform implementations

  • via Massive Interactive

    • MassiveSignal is a type safe port of Robert Penner's AS3 Signals library

  • via Massive Interactive

    • Parsex the packrat parser combinator library has been update to Haxe 2.10

  • via Stephane Le Dorze

    • Polygonal DS 1.36 has been released, now supporting Haxe 2.10

  • via Michael Baczynski

    • Haxe-GA is an google analytics client api port to Haxe

  • via Federico Bricker

    • Chxdoc 1.1.4 has been released

  • via Russell Weir
